scripts.clean: npm run clean:tgfx && rimraf demo/build demo/wasm demo/wasm-mt demo/.*.md5 demo/*.js demo/*.map demo/cmake-build-*
scripts.build: node script/cmake.demo.js -a wasm && npm run build:tgfx && rollup -c ./script/rollup.demo.js
scripts.build:debug: node script/cmake.demo.js -a wasm --debug && npm run build:tgfx && rollup -c ./script/rollup.demo.js
scripts.build:mt: node script/cmake.demo.js -a wasm-mt && npm run build:tgfx && rollup -c ./script/rollup.demo.js --environment ARCH:wasm-mt
scripts.build:mt:debug: node script/cmake.demo.js -a wasm-mt --debug && npm run build:tgfx && rollup -c ./script/rollup.demo.js --environment ARCH:wasm-mt
scripts.server:figma: npm run build:mt && node server_figma.js figma
